list.en: Why don't you find a girlfriend?
list.cn: 你为什么不找个女朋友?

list.en: Don't you feel lonely at all?
list.cn: 你一点都不觉得孤独吗?

list.en: Is there someone that you're interested in?
Being single is great. I'm not tied down to a relationship.
list.cn: 单身很棒。我没有被一段感情束缚住。

list.en: I used to enjoy being single.
Being single gives me all the freedom I need.
list.cn: 单身给了我所需的所有自由。

list.en: You could try dating someone again.
list.cn: 你可以试着再和别人约会。

list.en: I love being single. I have so much freedom.
list.cn: 我喜欢单身。我有这么多的自由。

list.en: He remains single.
It allows for more spontaneity in your life.
list.cn: 它让你的生活更有自发性。

list.en: I was alone in this new place.
list.cn: 我独自一人在这个新地方。

list.en: I'm poorly alone here.
list.cn: 我一个人在这里很难受。

list.en: He remained single after many years.
I'm alone, but I never feel lonely.
list.cn: 我独自一人，但我从不感到孤独。

list.en: Do you often have a date?
We date every weekend.
We often date in the park.
list.cn: 我们经常在公园里约会。

list.en: Would you like to have a meal with me?
list.cn: 你愿意和我一起吃饭吗?

list.en: Have you got any plans tonight?
Are you free this weekend?
You're the Mr Wright I am looking for.
list.cn: 你就是我要找的怀特先生。

list.en: Let's change another time.
Tell me what movie you like.
list.cn: 告诉我你喜欢什么电影。

list.en: I'm pleased to have a date with you.
I have dates with her everyday.
I've decided to go steady with him.
He's the just person I had dreamed of.
list.cn: 他就是我梦寐以求的人。

list.en: I believe someday I'll marry him.
list.cn: 我相信总有一天我会嫁给他。

list.en: I have fallen in love with him.
He loves her crazily.
His girlfriend is a knockout.
I have unrequited love.
I'm falling in love.
We love each other.
I have a crush on him.
She is everything to me.
I wish for our love to last forever.
list.cn: 我希望我们的爱天长地久。

list.en: We have been going out for three years.
We are crazy about each other.
How should I do if I propose?
list.cn: 如果我求婚了该怎么办?

list.en: He made a proposal to me.
It's time for you to propose.
Rose or lily is appropriate.
list.cn: 玫瑰或百合花都是合适的。

list.en: Will you marry me?
I would take care of you all my life.
Will you be my wife?
Let's be together till the end of our lives.
list.cn: 让我们在一起直到生命的尽头。

list.en: Where do you want our wedding be held?
list.cn: 你希望我们的婚礼在哪里举行?

list.en: Would like to stay with me forever.
I want to tell everyone our combination.
list.cn: 我想告诉大家我们的组合。

list.en: I am eager for having my own home.
Wherever you go, I will go with you.
list.cn: 无论你去哪里，我都会和你一起去。

list.en: I'll be pleased to be your wife.
I am eager to get married with you.
I can't wait to stay with you day and night.
list.cn: 我迫不及待地想和你日夜相伴。

list.en: I'll love you with all my heart.
I'd rather cook meals for you everyday.
I look forward to spending every night with you.
list.cn: 我期待和你共度每一个夜晚。

list.en: I hope you will be the man I see when I wake up.
list.cn: 我希望你是我醒来时看到的那个人。

list.en: I dream of being your beautiful bride.
list.cn: 我梦想成为你美丽的新娘。

list.en: I regard you as the most handsome bridegroom in the world.
list.cn: 我认为你是世界上最英俊的新郎。

list.en: I'm pleased to be the partner of your life.
list.cn: 我很高兴能成为你一生的伴侣。

list.en: I accepted his proposal.
I decided to marry him.
Don't you think it goes too fast?
I have thought about several months.
list.cn: 我已经考虑了好几个月了。

list.en: I don't want to get married.
I would like not to rush into marriage.
We have little in common.
I think marriage will affect my career.
list.cn: 我认为婚姻会影响我的事业。

list.en: I wouldn't marry a man like you.
list.cn: 我不会嫁给你这样的人。

list.en: We wouldn't be happy if we get married.
list.cn: 如果我们结婚，我们不会幸福的。

list.en: I wouldn't get married in so early age.
I think marriage will damage our love.
list.cn: 我认为婚姻会破坏我们的爱情。

list.en: I am not going to marry a poor man.
list.cn: 我不会嫁给一个穷人的。

list.en: I will marry you the day you get mature.
You are just the best friend in my mind.
list.cn: 你只是我心中最好的朋友。

list.en: Thanks for the wedding gifts.
Have you bought your dress yet?
Who do you want to send our invitations to?
list.cn: 你想把我们的请柬发给谁?

list.en: What kind of food do you want for the wedding?
list.cn: 婚礼上你想要什么样的食物?

list.en: Did you make an appointment with a wedding planner?
list.cn: 你预约婚礼策划人了吗?

list.en: How wonderful your wedding is.
Every girl is the most beautiful on this day.
list.cn: 每个女孩在这一天都是最漂亮的。

list.en: Will you hold it in the church?
list.cn: 你会在教堂里拿着它吗?

list.en: Do you invite me as the bridesmaid?
I've been waiting for this moment for ten years.
list.cn: 我等这一刻等了十年了。

list.en: The wedding will be held in the church.
Congratulations to you on your marriage.
We raise our glasses to you. Wishing you a long life together.
list.cn: 我们为你举杯。愿你们白头偕老。

list.en: What a wonderful wedding.
We wish you happy all your lives.
It's great to see you tie the Knot.
list.cn: 看到你结婚真是太好了。

list.en: Today is the most important day in my life.
list.cn: 今天是我一生中最重要的一天。

list.en: We took marital vows.
It's illegal for anyone to be fired because of pregnancy.
list.cn: 任何人因为怀孕而被解雇都是违法的。

list.en: It's good to be pregnant.
I've got a whole bunch of parenting guidebooks.
We are going to be parents.
Did they tell you when your due date is?
list.cn: 他们告诉你预产期了吗?

list.en: Have you taken a pregnancy test?
I think I'm pregnant.
I have morning sickness.
I'm due at the end of april.
My water just broke.
I'm three, I'm three months pregnant.
What do you think of marriage is the grave of love?
list.cn: 你怎么看婚姻是爱情的坟墓?

list.en: How do you like the marriage life?
list.cn: 你觉得婚姻生活怎么样?

list.en: It plays an important part in my life.
list.cn: 它在我的生活中扮演着重要的角色。

list.en: We should depend on each other.
We must keep calm and communicate well.
list.cn: 我们必须保持冷静，好好沟通。

list.en: We are satisfied with our marriage life.
list.cn: 我们对婚姻生活很满意。

list.en: Wives should show understanding and sympathy to husband.
list.cn: 妻子应该对丈夫表示理解和同情。

list.en: We experienced much happiness and sorrow together.
list.cn: 我们一起经历了许多快乐和悲伤。

list.en: They should be responsible for family.
Children can make the marriage life sweet and perfect.
list.cn: 孩子可以使婚姻生活甜蜜而完美。

list.en: There was nothing better than marriage life.
list.cn: 没有什么比婚姻生活更好的了。

list.en: We should share our happiness and sorrow together.
list.cn: 我们应该一起分享我们的快乐和悲伤。

list.en: The husband should do the housework together with the wife.
list.cn: 丈夫应该和妻子一起做家务。

list.en: Get lost.
Shut up.
Nonsense.
Don't bother me.
You're crazy.
Drop dead.
Knock it off.
Stop complaining.
I can't stand you anymore.
You make me sick.
What did you say?
You're a jerk.
Don't talk to me like that.
Who do you think you are?
I regret having met you.
You will drive me mad.
You are a selfish man.
Don't look at me like that.
You were out of your mind.
I don't want to stay with you any longer.
list.cn: 我不想再和你呆在一起了。

list.en: She had a change of heart.
Let's break up.
What you did make me disappointed with you.
list.cn: 你的所作所为让我对你很失望。

list.en: Staying together can just make a sorrow.
What you did force me to break up.
list.cn: 你的所作所为迫使我分手。

list.en: Only separating can keep us from quarrelling.
list.cn: 只有分开，我们才能不吵架。

list.en: I won't see you from now on.
list.cn: 从现在起我不会再见到你了。

list.en: I feel unhappy with you.
May you find a better lover.
list.cn: 愿你找到一个更好的爱人。

list.en: I would like not to part with you.
I can't bear your rudeness.
I can't accept the fact that you leave me.
list.cn: 我无法接受你离开我的事实。

list.en: I don't know how I'll live without you.
list.cn: 我不知道没有你我该怎么活。

list.en: I have thought about our separation for several months.
list.cn: 几个月来我一直在考虑我们分居的事。

list.en: When will the divorce be final?
Let's get de divorced.
Stop quarrelling and go divorce.
We have to divorce in this situation.
list.cn: 这种情况下我们只能离婚了。

list.en: We have filed for divorce.
Who will bring up the children?
I'll divorce you, whatever you say.
list.cn: 不管你说什么，我都要和你离婚。

list.en: I feel much pressure living with you.
list.cn: 和你一起生活压力很大。

list.en: Divorce will hurt the children deeply.
list.cn: 离婚会深深地伤害孩子们。

list.en: We should think twice before we make our decision to get divorced.
list.cn: 我们在决定离婚之前应该三思而行。

list.en: We are finished.
We have reached the end of the line.
Happy anniversary, I love you forever.
Let's propose a toast to our tenth wedding anniversary.
list.cn: 让我们提议为我们的十周年结婚纪念日干杯。

list.en: It's our wedding anniversary today.
list.cn: 今天是我们的结婚纪念日。

list.en: I missed my beautiful wedding dress.
list.cn: 我想念我漂亮的结婚礼服。

list.en: It's you who support me whenever I have trouble.
list.cn: 每当我遇到困难时，都是你支持我。

list.en: We are a perfect match.
I am grateful for the moments of our life together.
list.cn: 我很感激我们在一起的时光。

list.en: I will celebrate the day with you every year.
list.cn: 我每年都会和你一起庆祝这一天。

list.en: Here is to our long and romantic marriage life.
list.cn: 为我们长久而浪漫的婚姻生活干杯。

list.en: I can still remember clearly the day we got married.
list.cn: 我仍然清楚地记得我们结婚的那一天。

list.en: I promise to love you till my death.
I never regret getting married with you.
